body:
This maintenance release focuses on the following points:
* remove unary_function and binary_function which are deprecated in c++11 and removed in c++17.
* update m4 macros for c++ detection and boost_base
* maintenance on configure.ac

name: Remove cudd unbundling
body: This release removes the cudd unbundling as it is not ready for release.

name: Maintenance release
body:
This is a new maintenance release of the 1.2 branch of BRiAL. The following issues are addressed
* Clarify the license as it has always been GPL2+
* Updating of boost detection macros for issue #49 
* Include some package information in config.h for issue #46 
* Include some work on using external CUDD - unfortunately only CUDD 2.5.x is supported at this stage. Further PR allowing CUDD 3+ would be welcome

name: maintenance release
body:
This is a new maintenance release of BRiAl 1.2. It includes the following
* inclusion of an old debian patch relevant to ia64 and alpha architecture #45 
* Fix the configuration script to not error in some cases that should be allowed 5ddb5368e023d270deb34ff021125c0a06498060
* Fix deprecation warnings in the test suite for boost 1.71.0 and over 5ddb5368e023d270deb34ff021125c0a06498060

name: Macro clean up
body: This release focuses on clean up of old macros that are either redundant or not used. It also tighten the initial config.h.in and minor fixes on the sage python component.

Minor python 3.8 fixes.
No change to libraries.

name: brial-1.2.5
body:
Minor fixes:
* compliance with C++ standard in inline headers revealed by gcc-9.1
* parallel building issues in the testsuite

name: BRiAl-1.2.4
body: Python3 fixes only - no changes to the libraries.

name: brial-1.2.3
body: Better fix for the test suite by improving the initialisation of vectors. Thanks Julian Rüth for his work.

name: brial-1.2.2
body: Fix to the test suite on OS X and when using clang's libcxx.

name: brial-1.2.1
body: Just a minor python3 fix in sage-brial. No soname change in the library.

name: BRiAl-1.2.0
body: Fix most of the warnings generated by g++ and clang++. Fix a few terrible bugs in code that is obviously not widely used.

This release includes many small code fix and clean up and one minor API change. This release now requires C++11.
Thanks to Jeroen Demeyer and Rusydi H. Makarim for their contributions.
Minor fix to python side. It was not quite finished after all.

name: new start
body: Clean up of the source tree and small re-organisation of the code. Restored the test suite.

name: BRiAL-0.8.7
body: This release settles on using "unordered_map" exclusively. If the C++ compiler doesn't provide a form of "unordered_map", configure will stop with an error message. This should work for g++-5.4 and under which provide "unordered_map" through TR1 and clang-3.8/g++-6.1 and over providing them as part of the standard library in C++11.

name: BRiAL-0.8.6
body: Maintenance release with python 2/3 and C++ fixes.

name: BRiAl-0.8.5
body: Move library name from polybori to brial. Fixes for gcc-6.1 and python-3. Includes various fixes already included in sage.
